ValidationRule.description: Do not allow users to edit Closed Opptys.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, "PGi"), PRIORVALUE(IsClosed) = True, $User.Override_Validation_Rules__c = False, $User.DelegatedPowerUserAccess__c = False, $User.ProfileId <> "00e30000001kms9", $Profile.Name <> "PGi Implementation Services" , $Profile.Name <> "PGi Contract Manager", NOT($Setup.BypassRules__c.Disable_Validation_Rules__c), NOT(ISCHANGED(NCS_Generated_Date__c)), NOT(ISCHANGED( CountofISTRecords__c )), $Profile.Name <> "PGi Marketing User" && NOT (ISCHANGED (Converted_from_MQL__c)), NOT (CONTAINS($User.Username, "mary.osullivan@pgi.com")) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot edit an opportunity that has been Closed. If the opportunity needs to be changed, please submit a case to request the change or work with your regional Sales Operations team.
